      private java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Point> getLegalPosition​(Worker worker, Board board, int whatToDo)
      method to get the legal position for a build or a move
      Parameters:
      worker - that wants to build or move
      board - the game board
      whatToDo - 0 if move and 1 if build
      Returns:
      arraylist of points representing the legal positions
